response.overview: August 6th, 2000 :: The second and final night of Pro Wrestling NOAH's Departure extravaganza took place on August 6, 2000 at the Tokyo Differ Ariake in Tokyo, Japan. 	Matches include:  ⦁	Jun Akiyama vs Kenta Kobashi  ⦁	Mitsuharu Misawa & Yoshinari Ogawa vs Daisuke Ikeda & Kentaro Shiga  ⦁	Akira Taue & Jun Izumida vs No Fear (Takao Omori & Yoshihiro Takayama)  ⦁	Naomichi Marufuji & Takeshi Rikio vs Masao Inoue & Takeshi Morishima  ⦁	Makoto Hashi, Mitsuo Momota & Rusher Kimura vs Haruka Eigen, Tsuyoshi Kikuchi & Yoshinobu Kanemaru  ⦁	Kenta Kobayashi vs Satoru Asako
response.title: NOAH: Departure 2nd
